QueryDefinition.Query:
DECLARE @sql nvarchar(MAX)
SET @sql = N' SELECT CASE WHEN e.[STATE] IS NOT NULL THEN e.[STATE] ELSE ''UN'' END AS [STATE], e.EGEOLOC AS LOCATION_SOURCE_VALUE FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT EGEOLOC FROM ENROLLMENT_DETAIL ) x LEFT JOIN GEOLOC e ON e.EGEOLOC = x.EGEOLOC ORDER BY x.EGEOLOC'
IF (NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = 'LONG_TERM_CARE')) BEGIN
EXECUTE sp_executesql @sql;
END
